name: Switch.Root

checked.description: Whether or not the switch is checked.
checked.description_zh: Whether or not the switch is checked.

onCheckedChange.description: A callback function called when the checked state of the switch changes.
onCheckedChange.description_zh: A callback function called when the checked state of the switch changes.

disabled.description: Whether or not the switch is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the switch is disabled.

includeInput.description: Whether or not to include the input element in the switch. This will automatically add a hidden input element to the switch that will be checked when the switch is checked.
includeInput.description_zh: Whether or not to include the input element in the switch. This will automatically add a hidden input element to the switch that will be checked when the switch is checked.

inputAttrs.description: Attributes to be spread onto the hidden input element.
inputAttrs.description_zh: Attributes to be spread onto the hidden input element.

name.description: The name of the hidden input element, used to identify the input in form submissions.
name.description_zh: The name of the hidden input element, used to identify the input in form submissions.

required.description: Whether or not the switch is required to be checked.
required.description_zh: Whether or not the switch is required to be checked.

value.description: The value of the hidden input element to be used in form submissions when the switch is checked.
value.description_zh: The value of the hidden input element to be used in form submissions when the switch is checked.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The root switch component used to set and manage the state of the switch.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
